attributes.action: Make Devon the Organic County of the UK agriculturally and horticulturally.
attributes.background:
There is a need for safe food production and a worldwide purchasing power for this.
Many growers are already soil certified and as a lot of land is currently unused by the landowners, hoping to sell for building, it would be easy to obtain certification for this land. 
Devon would remain green.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
